charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a walk in
a cave when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed something light up in
front of [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1101_0200_2:
The mysterious light drew closer and closer...
Then it let out a growl!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_0401_0400_1:
Who’s that screaming? That was so loud, it’s
echoing all over the cave!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_0402_0600_1: A ghost? Now that’s a scary thought!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_0800_1: Hm? Why are you looking at Watchog like that?
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1000_1:
That’s why you screamed just now—because you
saw her, right?
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1100_1: Watchog’s eyes shine brightly even in the dark.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1200_1: Sorry about that. We didn’t mean to startle you.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1300_1: We came to this cave to do some research.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1400_1:
Even though Pasio’s an artificial island, the ruins
and underground caves here are incredibly
well-created.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1600_1:
As the director of the Nacrene Museum, I thought I
might learn something that would help the
exhibits there.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1700_1:
Watchog has keen eyesight even in dark places
like caves.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_1800_1:
So she’s been traveling all over Pasio with me to
observe together.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_0401_2000_1:
She is indeed! The little gal’s always helping
me out.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_0302_2100_1:
Sounds more like an assistant than
a partner.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_0402_2200_1: Ah ha ha! You might be right!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_2300_1: Watchog’s a wonderful partner AND assistant!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_2400_1:
Even back in Unova, she acted as my eyes when
we were exploring ruins or doing
excavation work.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_2500_1:
She helped by warning me whenever we came
across an unstable area!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_2600_1:
I raised her so lovingly, so I’m so proud of what
she’s become!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_2700_1:
Anyway, the two of us are going to keep up our
research here for a bit longer...
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_2800_1:
but if you discover anything interesting in this
cave, please come and tell us!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_3300_1:
The ground gets really muddy over there, so it’s
dangerous to just go off running.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_3400_1:
I’m glad to see you so active and brimming with
curiosity, but please be careful.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_3500_1: Going all out is important, but so is caution, OK?
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_3600_1: It’s the same with Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_3700_1:
Pausing for a moment to determine exactly when
to use each move is vital.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_3800_1:
But that enthusiasm of yours is also one of your
strengths, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_3900_1: Just keep what I told you in mind, that’s all.
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_4000_1:
And if anything happens to you, we’ll be there in
a flash!
charaepi_ch0169_00_aloe/2301_1201_4100_1: Now you can go for real this time!
